short_summary: Human Resources (HR) Staffing Support for the Chemical Emergency Management and Toxicovigilance Division (CHEMTD), Health Canada.
description: Human Resources (HR) Staffing Support is required to assist with the delivery and assessment offour (4) mandatory internally advertised national Staffing Selection Processes at the following groups and levels: PC-03, PC-05, PM-05, and PM-06. Four (4) optional processes at the following levels may be required: PC-02, PC-04, EC-05, and EC-06. The mandatory and optional Selection Processes are to use various assessment methods, such as application screening, written exams, virtual/video interviews, and reference checks.
full_summary: **Human Resource Staffing Support Opportunity** ==================================================================== **Title:** Human Resource Staffing Support for the Chemical Emergency Management and Toxicovigilance Division (CHEMTD), Health Canada **Reference Number: PW-23-01023102 **Publication Date: January 25, 2023 **Tender Closing Date:** February 7, 2023, 11:00 PM EST **Solicitation Number: 1000245329 **Region of Opportunity:** Worldwide **Region of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR) **Procurement Category: **SRV** **Request for Proposal (RFP)** Health Canada's Chemical Emergency Management and Toxicovigilance Division (CHEMTD) is seeking a contractor to provide Human Resource Staffing Support. The successful bidder will assist with the delivery and assessment of four (4) mandatory nationally advertised Staffing Selection Processes at various grades. **Key Tasks:** * Assist with the delivery and assessment of four (4) mandatory nationally advertised Staffing Selection Processes for: PC-03, PC-05, PM-05, and PM-06. * Provide support for four (4) optional selection processes at PC-02, PC-04, EC-05, and EC-06 levels. * Utilize a variety of assessment methods, including application screening, written exams, virtual/video interviews, and reference checks. **Eligibility** To be eligible, bidders must have experience in providing Human Resource Services, Business Consulting/Change Management, and Project Management Services. **Trade Agreements** This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements: * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement **Attachment:** The solicitation document is available for download from Canada Buys. **Contact Information:** For inquiries and submissions, please contact Sami Nouh at: * Email: * Telephone: 613-941-2102 --- Note that I have only mentioned perameters necessary for submission to procured the project successfully.
